name: Godot Launcher
description:
An easy to use launcher and manager for the Godot game engine. Manage multiple versions of Godot from one easy location.

Features:

  • Install and launch multiple versions of Godot (including pre-release versions)
  • Add your projects to the launcher
  • Assign each project a specific version of Godot
  • When you click on the project it will always launch using the version you specify
  • Works on Windows, Mac, and Linux
